item.title: Philosophical Arguments for the Impossibility of an Actual Infinite
item.description: This Google Sheet contains a developing bibliography of materials on philosophical arguments for the impossibility of an actual infinite. The emphasis is on English academic materials in the analytic tradition, though alternative traditions and formats (YouTube interviews) will be included where available.
